titles: The game at chesse. A metaphoricall discourse shewing the present estate of this kingdome. The kings, the queenes, the bishops, the knights, the rooks, the pawns. The knights signifie the high Court of Parliament; the rookes, the cavaleers.
author: Cartwright, William, 1611-1643, attributed name.
notes: Attributed to William Cartwright in the Wrenn catalogue.
Title page has llustration of men at chess.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
